sections.heading: Streets, highways, and railroad property; assessment; tax; collection
sections.text: When any ditch, drain, improved watercourse, dike, levee or other drainage improvement, located and established under sections 31-301 to 31-369, crosses, drains, or protects either in whole or in part any street, highway, public o

sections.heading: constitutional. County property may be assessed for special improvements, and assessments should be charged to county and not township
sections.text: Drainage Dist. No. 1 of Richardson County v. Richardson County, 86 Neb. 355, 125 N.W. 796 (1910).
